name: Jesse Knight
title: Website
bio: Hello! First year Raw Talker and IMS PhD student here, working out of St Michael's Hospital. In my research, I simulate HIV epidemics using maths and code. This season I'm looking forward to giving the website a reboot, and getting my hands dirty with my first couple of episodes. Outside the lab, I like to: contribute to open source code projects, go backcountry camping, convince you to try LaTeX, and worry about the climate crisis.
